body: Fill the tiling chip with 200 μl pre-warmed stripping buffer.
Place the chip in hybridization oven at 65°C. Rotate 20 min at 60 rpm.
Remove stripping buffer. Strip again with another 200 μl of stripping buffer for 10 min.
Repeat step 4 for one more time.
Remove the stripping buffer and fill with 200 μl of wash buffer A to wash. Place the chip in the hybridization oven at 65°C. Rotate 5 min at 60 rpm.
Remove the wash buffer and repeat step 6 twice.
Fill with 250 μl storage buffer. Scan chip to check stripping efficiency.
Scan the chip to check the scanned image.
If no signal is detected on the image, proceed to hybridize with the target \(re-probe).
Replace the storage buffer with pre-hybridization buffer. Place the chip in the hybridization oven at 45°C. Rotate 5 min at 60 rpm.
If not re-probed immediately, the chip can be stored at 4°C overnight.
